resources:
UPMC DASH Plugin: UPMC Dash Please rate how severe the following symptoms are right now from 0 (symptom not present) to 10 (symptom was as bad as you can imagine it could be). Please choose Yes or Not to indicate whether you experienced the following symptoms in the last 24 hours. For any symptoms marked as Yes, rate how severe the symptom was in the last 24 hours from 0 (symptom not present) to 10 (symptom was as bad as you can imagine it could be) What was the most stressful or negative event you experienced today? This service makes sure the application is running at all times. Please activate it during the study. Activate UPMC DASH in the accessibility services. UPMC DASH InabilityResponseForm DemoESM
WearStatusActivity Dummy Button DUMMY\nCONTENT Your Response DemoMode InabilityResponseActivity
Pain Fatigue/Tiredness Sleep Disturbance Trouble Concentrating/Remembering Things Feel Sad/Down Feel Anxious/Worried Shortness of Breathv Numbness/Tingling Nausea Diarrhea/Constipation Dizziness/lightheadedness Other
